name: coc-codellama
description: coc completion using ollama's codellama model
author: FalcoGer <16250196+FalcoGer@users.noreply.github.com>

coc-codellama.port.description: The remote port to connect to.

coc-codellama.contextAbove.description: How many lines above the current line to include in the context for completion.

coc-codellama.contextBelow.description: How many lines below the current line to include in the context for completion.

coc-codellama.shortcut.description: The shortcut to use for this completion source.

coc-codellama.priority.description: How far up in the list to put completions from this source.

coc-codellama.model.description: The large language model to use for completions.
